content: this adult sized crochet cardigan is simple and easy to make it s lightweight for summer laying on vacation or over a tank and jeans for a simple handmade wardrobe effortless stripes are integrated with easy-to-follow stitch tables that let you crochet along without worrying about following an intricate pattern pattern includes sizes xs-3xl womens this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet front post and back post stitches chain stitch skip stitches and slip_stitch
